All the actors that play Chiron are amazing There performances combine to make one great character With mostly minimal dialogue they convey much heart needed for this person to become alive on screen. This is an all black cast Something that is very refreshing to see It really helps to create the harsh urban environment that these people live in. Towards the end the c onversations between the c haracters become so heartfelt and real that it really made me love this movie more.
